vendor_name: Dunston Hall Hotel, Spa and Golf Resort
title: Norfolk Countryside Spa & Golf Hotel set in 150 Acres of Woodland
description:
Allow yourself to be swept up in the charm of an Elizabethan-style mansion when you escape to the grand Dunston Hall Hotel, Spa & Golf Resort. Making a statement in the Norfolk countryside since 1859, moments from the protected wetlands of the Broads National Park, this charming hall has been lovingly restored and features a luxurious health club and spa with an indoor heated pool, a scenic championship golf course, The Brasserie Restaurant and three bars.

When you're not enjoying a leisurely day of pampering, why not indulge in a traditional afternoon tea overlooking the gardens or discover the rich history of neighbouring Norwich, with its ancient castle, cathedral and world-class dining scene?
